entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lansdowne House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:13 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lansdowne House Airport 08:05 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure: 99.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: SW 17 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to snow at times heavy near midnight. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
